description: Check for explicit consent collection statement.
prompt_instructions: Analyze the provided text for clauses related to data processing consent.

Identify specific sentences where the user explicitly agrees or consents to the processing of their personal data (e.g., 'I consent to...', 'I agree to the processing...', ticking a checkbox description).
If one or more explicit consent statements are found, respond with 'Consent Statement Found' followed by the exact quote(s) of the statement(s).
If no explicit consent statement is found, respond with 'Consent Statement Not Found'.
Respond ONLY with the finding and quote(s) if applicable.
